column4: I'm planning to install Windows XP and Windows 7 on a second hard drive. One problem is, my system clock is set to UTC. Has the bug with Windows failing to understand UTC been fixed, or must I change the system clock to local time?
try browsing based on teh sites ip address not name. if ip# works - then it points to a DNS issue
I think I've tried that, but I should double check. I've been trying a lot of things with changing DNS servers, and that's not helped.
